info.id: SDP1724 FT - COM-SA forwards CM notifications for runtime attributes. Non-prefixed MOM, key attribute case 1
info.description: SDP1724 FT - COM-SA forwards CM notifications for runtime attributes. Non-prefixed MOM, key attribute case 1

config.testOIarg2: -d -C -c TestStructSv -k id -r id=TestStructAttrSv_0 -p objImpComplexClassSvId=1 -a testRuntimeAttrInt32 -v 2 -s 3 -n FT1724testOI
config.testOIarg3: -d -C -c TestStructSv -k id -r id=TestStructAttrSv_1 -p objImpComplexClassSvId=1 -a testRuntimeAttrInt32 -v 6 -s 3 -n FT1724testOI
config.testOIarg10: -d -C -c TestStructSv -k id -r id=TestStructAttrSv_0 -p objImpComplexClassSvId=2 -a testRuntimeAttrInt32 -v 5 -s 3 -n FT1724testOI
config.searchPatterns1: ['com: testConsumer1: ', 'cmEventNotify(): txHandle: 0 ', 'sourceIndicator: ResourceOperation dn: ManagedElement=1,ObjImpComplexClassSv=1 eventType: MoCreated attributes: name: TestStructAttrSv attrType: STRUCT nrOfValues: 0 eventTime: ']
